mapper.select: select pwd from member_info where id=#{id} and outdate is null
select apt_no from household_info where household_code=(select household_code from member_info where id=#{id})
select h.auth_code from household_info h join member_info m on h.HOUSEHOLD_CODE=m.HOUSEHOLD_CODE where m.id=#{id}
select count(*) from household_info where household_code=#{householdCode}
